titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fThomas, Collation unit C03b

sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2018-10-03 19:23:51.102012 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2020-01-02T22:33:56.362-05:00.

body.ab: He is, indeed, of so amiable a nature, that he will not hunt (a favourite, and almost the only amusement here), because he cannot endure to spill blood. <del sID="novel1_letter2_div2_p5_del1"/>He is, moreover, heroically generous.<del eID="novel1_letter2_div2_p5_del1"/> <add sID="novel1_letter2_div2_p5_add1"/>I will relate to you an anecdote of his life, recounted to me by the parties themselves, which exemplifies the generosity, I had almost said the heroism of his nature.<add eID="novel1_letter2_div2_p5_add1"/>
